StatusClass.description: The class of the status e.g Retail, Hire, TailorMe

StatusCode.description: The (required) unique code for the status e.g InProcessing

SubStatusCode.description: A sub status if applicable e.g Invoiced

SeqNo.description: The sequence number of this status in relation to all the possible values if naturally ordinal e.g 2

ReasonCode.description: A reason code for the status being in this state e.g Faulty Product

ReasonDesc.description: A reason description for the status being in this state

Lineage.description: The event lineage (e.g eventId, asOf) that lead to the observed/derived state of this object/data part
